title: I Is for important
brief_description: The film covers examples of sex role stereotyping in social interaction and emotional expression in schools. The scenes include sex role bias in disciplinary actions and student task assignments and children’s resistance to role reversal in kindergarten play.
description: The film covers examples of sex role stereotyping in social interaction and emotional expression in schools. The scenes include sex role bias in disciplinary actions and student task assignments and children’s resistance to role reversal in kindergarten play.
